name: Up to the Moon! Demo
description:
Note: You are currently playing the demo version. If you want to play the full version, just wait until it arrives.

Up to the Moon! (Demo) has arrived. Come and play now!

HOW THE GAME WORKS Play as the rocket trying to go to the moon, and dodge the objects falling from the sky. You can costumize the rocket. PLOT OF THE GAME

Someone had tested out a functional remote control rocket, which used gasoline. She now prepares for danger ahead of the rocket.

FULL VERSION NOTES:
  • The full version of "Up to the Moon!" was scheduled to be released in December 18, 2021.
  • It will have a shop system for you to buy some good stuff like extra recolored rockets.
  • The settings will be having functioning controls.
  • Have fun when it's released!
UPCOMING UPDATES
  • Official release

If there are bugs, please message me in GMAIL: mrjamYT12@gmail.com.
